mapper.select: SELECT A.PLACE_ID, A.PLACE_NAME, A.PLACE_LOCATION, A.PLACE_PHONE_NUM, B.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID, B.PLACE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PLACE A JOIN PLACE_CATEGORY B ON (A.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID = B.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID)

SELECT A.PLACE_ID, A.PLACE_NAME, A.PLACE_LOCATION, A.PLACE_PHONE_NUM, B.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID, B.PLACE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PLACE A JOIN PLACE_CATEGORY B ON (A.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID = B.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID) WHERE PLACE_ID = #{placeId}
SELECT A.STAR_ID, A.STAR_POINT, A.STAR_COMMENT, A.PLACE_ID, A.MEMBER_ID FROM PLACE_STAR A WHERE PLACE_ID = #{placeId} ORDER BY A.STAR_POINT DESC
SELECT A.STAR_ID, A.STAR_POINT, A.STAR_COMMENT, A.PLACE_ID, A.MEMBER_ID FROM PLACE_STAR A WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT A.COURSE_ID, A.COURSE_NAME, A.MEMBER_ID, C.PLACE_ID, C.PLACE_NAME, C.PLACE_LOCATION, C.PLACE_PHONE_NUM, D.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID, D.PLACE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM COURSE A JOIN COURSE_PLACE B on A.course_ID = B.course_ID JOIN PLACE C ON C.PLACE_ID = B.PLACE_ID JOIN PLACE_CATEGORY D ON C.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID = D.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID WHERE B.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY B.PLACE_SEQUENCE

SELECT A.PLACE_ID, A.PLACE_NAME, A.PLACE_LOCATION, A.PLACE_PHONE_NUM, D.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID, D.PLACE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM place A JOIN course_place B ON A.place_id = B.place_id JOIN course C ON B.course_id = C.course_id JOIN PLACE_CATEGORY D ON (A.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID = D.PLACE_CATEGORY_ID) WHERE C.course_Id = #{courseId}
SELECT A.COURSE_ID, A.COURSE_NAME, A.MEMBER_ID FROM COURSE A WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT IFNULL(AVG(star_point), 0) FROM PLACE_STAR WHERE PLACE_ID = #{placeId};
